content: To make things a bit easier and safer (as long as you don't mind taking your time), we recommend simply charging up your Thrust Stance and expending 2 focus points to deal with any swinging threats immediately, and then beating around the empty cocoons like pinatas to better see the path ahead (and gain Will).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Upper Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Pool of Shattered Jade'.
The content is as follows:
To make things a bit easier and safer (as long as you don't mind taking your time), we recommend simply charging up your Thrust Stance and expending 2 focus points to deal with any swinging threats immediately, and then beating around the empty cocoons like pinatas to better see the path ahead (and gain Will).
